self_predictions.prediction_summary: Ermes believes he will win easily against Alizhan Muratov, especially if Alizhan stays in the 105kg category. He feels confident in his pronation and overall power.
self_predictions.style_conflict: Ermes thinks Alizhan cannot hook him and that his pronation is stronger.

Alizhan Muratov.strength: Super mega strong, but Ermes believes he can handle him.
Alizhan Muratov.previous_match_summary: Destroyed Frutnik, but Ermes thinks he can dominate him.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Ermes thinks Levan is more hungry and angry, and will likely win, but acknowledges Devon's confidence and goals.

Levan Saginashvili.strength: Super big and strong, difficult to take advantage of.
Levan Saginashvili.health: Levan claims to always have pain in his left arm.
Levan Saginashvili.previous_match_summary: Already beat Devon once, and Ermes thinks he will do it again.

Devon Larratt.strength: Smart and strong, but Ermes thinks Levan is stronger.
Devon Larratt.previous_match_summary: Devon is coming to prove something, but Ermes doubts he can beat Levan.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Ermes thinks Vitaly will win 65-70% of the time if he fights like he did against Ermes. He acknowledges Dave's potential surprises but leans towards Vitaly.

Vitaly Laletin.strength: Very strong grip and power, close to Ermes's level.
Vitaly Laletin.previous_match_summary: Fought a super hard match against Ermes, showing incredible endurance.

Dave Chaffee.strength: Strong, but Ermes thinks he is currently more down in shape.
Dave Chaffee.previous_match_summary: Had some rest, so his current form is unknown.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Engin notes that 60% of poll voters think Ermes will win, which surprises him as he expected more people to favor Alizhan.

Alizhan Muratov.strength: Super strong, but Engin thinks Ermes can handle him.
Alizhan Muratov.previous_match_summary: Destroyed Frutnik, but Engin thinks Ermes can dominate him.

Ermes Gasparini.previous_match_summary: Has been climbing the rankings quickly and is confident.
